periods.name: This Afternoon
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 1pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly sunny, with a high near 82. Southeast wind 7 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

periods.name: Tonight
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely before 5am, then showers and thunderstorms likely. Some of the storms could produce heavy rain. Mostly cloudy. Low around 67, with temperatures rising to around 69 overnight. South southeast wind around 12 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%.

periods.name: Tuesday
periods.shortForecast: Showers And Thunderstorms Likely then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely before 7am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Some of the storms could be severe and produce heavy rain. Partly sunny. High near 82, with temperatures falling to around 79 in the afternoon. South southwest wind 12 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%.

periods.name: Tuesday Night
periods.shortForecast: Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Mostly Clear
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 7pm. Some of the storms could be severe. Mostly clear, with a low around 58. West wind 6 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%.

periods.name: Wednesday
periods.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 72. West wind 8 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph.

periods.name: Wednesday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 51. West northwest wind 6 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

periods.name: Thursday
periods.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 66. Northwest wind 8 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

periods.name: Thursday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 49. Northwest wind 2 to 9 mph.

periods.name: Friday
periods.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 71. Northwest wind 3 to 7 mph.

periods.name: Friday Night
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers after 7pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. South southeast wind around 5 mph.

periods.name: Saturday

periods.name: Saturday Night
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 1am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 56. East wind around 6 mph.

periods.name: Sunday
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 73. East wind around 8 mph.
